verses.verse: And if <WH518> his oblation <WH7133> be a sacrifice <WH2077> of peace offering, <WH8002> if <WH518> he <WH1931> offer <WH7126> it of <WH4480> the herd; <WH1241> whether <WH518> it be a male <WH2145> or <WH518> female, <WH5347> he shall offer <WH7126> it without blemish <WH8549> before <WH6440> the LORD. <WH3068>

And he shall lay <WH5564> his hand <WH3027> upon <WH5921> the head <WH7218> of his offering, <WH7133> and kill <WH7819> it at the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation: <WH4150> and Aaron's <WH175> sons <WH1121> the priests <WH3548> shall sprinkle <WH2236> <WH853> the blood <WH1818> upon <WH5921> the altar <WH4196> round about. <WH5439>

And he shall offer <WH7126> of the sacrifice <WH4480> <WH2077> of the peace offering <WH8002> an offering made by fire <WH801> unto the LORD; <WH3068> <WH853> the fat <WH2459> that covereth <WH3680> <WH853> the inwards, <WH7130> and all <WH3605> the fat <WH2459> that <WH834> is upon <WH5921> the inwards, <WH7130>

And the two <WH8147> kidneys, <WH3629> and the fat <WH2459> that <WH834> is on <WH5921> them, which <WH834> is by <WH5921> the flanks, <WH3689> and the caul <WH3508> above <WH5921> the liver, <WH3516> with <WH5921> the kidneys, <WH3629> it shall he take away. <WH5493>

And Aaron's <WH175> sons <WH1121> shall burn <WH6999> it on the altar <WH4196> upon <WH5921> the burnt sacrifice, <WH5930> which <WH834> is upon <WH5921> the wood <WH6086> that <WH834> is on <WH5921> the fire: <WH784> it is an offering made by fire, <WH801> of a sweet <WH5207> savor <WH7381> unto the LORD. <WH3068>

And if <WH518> his offering <WH7133> for a sacrifice <WH2077> of peace offering <WH8002> unto the LORD <WH3068> be of <WH4480> the flock; <WH6629> male <WH2145> or <WH176> female, <WH5347> he shall offer <WH7126> it without blemish. <WH8549>
If <WH518> he <WH1931> offer <WH7126> a lamb <WH3775> <WH853> for his offering, <WH7133> then shall he offer <WH7126> it before <WH6440> the LORD. <WH3068>

And he shall lay <WH5564> <WH853> his hand <WH3027> upon <WH5921> the head <WH7218> of his offering, <WH7133> and kill <WH7819> it before <WH6440> the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation: <WH4150> and Aaron's <WH175> sons <WH1121> shall sprinkle <WH2236> <WH853> the blood <WH1818> thereof round about <WH5439> upon <WH5921> the altar. <WH4196>

And he shall offer <WH7126> of the sacrifice <WH4480> <WH2077> of the peace offering <WH8002> an offering made by fire <WH801> unto the LORD; <WH3068> the fat <WH2459> thereof, and the whole <WH8549> rump, <WH451> it shall he take off <WH5493> hard by <WH5980> the backbone; <WH6096> and the fat <WH2459> that covereth <WH3680> <WH853> the inwards, <WH7130> and all <WH3605> the fat <WH2459> that <WH834> is upon <WH5921> the inwards, <WH7130>

And the two <WH8147> kidneys, <WH3629> and the fat <WH2459> that <WH834> is upon <WH5921> them, which <WH834> is by <WH5921> the flanks, <WH3689> and the caul <WH3508> above <WH5921> the liver, <WH3516> with <WH5921> the kidneys, <WH3629> it shall he take away. <WH5493>
And the priest <WH3548> shall burn <WH6999> it upon the altar: <WH4196> it is the food <WH3899> of the offering made by fire <WH801> unto the LORD. <WH3068>
And if <WH518> his offering <WH7133> be a goat, <WH5795> then he shall offer <WH7126> it before <WH6440> the LORD. <WH3068>

And he shall lay <WH5564> <WH853> his hand <WH3027> upon <WH5921> the head <WH7218> of it, and kill <WH7819> it before <WH6440> the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation: <WH4150> and the sons <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> shall sprinkle <WH2236> <WH853> the blood <WH1818> thereof upon <WH5921> the altar <WH4196> round about. <WH5439>

And he shall offer <WH7126> thereof <WH4480> his offering, <WH7133> even an offering made by fire <WH801> unto the LORD; <WH3068> <WH853> the fat <WH2459> that covereth <WH3680> <WH853> the inwards, <WH7130> and all <WH3605> the fat <WH2459> that <WH834> is upon <WH5921> the inwards, <WH7130>

And the two <WH8147> kidneys, <WH3629> and the fat <WH2459> that <WH834> is upon <WH5921> them, which <WH834> is by <WH5921> the flanks, <WH3689> and the caul <WH3508> above <WH5921> the liver, <WH3516> with <WH5921> the kidneys, <WH3629> it shall he take away. <WH5493>

And the priest <WH3548> shall burn <WH6999> them upon the altar: <WH4196> it is the food <WH3899> of the offering made by fire <WH801> for a sweet <WH5207> savor: <WH7381> all <WH3605> the fat <WH2459> is the LORD's. <WH3068>

It shall be a perpetual <WH5769> statute <WH2708> for your generations <WH1755> throughout all <WH3605> your dwellings, <WH4186> that ye eat <WH398> neither <WH3808> <WH3605> fat <WH2459> nor blood. <WH1818>
